author: Anne Barker
title: 'An agonising decision': Coronavirus forces ABC Indonesia correspondent to return home
description: As the coronavirus threat escalated in Indonesia, airlines pulled out and borders closed, ABC correspondent Anne Barker made the difficult decision to pull out and return home temporarily.
content:
It must be the most agonising decision I've ever made.
Ten days ago it never crossed my mind or anyone's in the Jakarta bureau that we wouldn't continue as ever, reporting on events in Indonesia.
Even after the first two cases of coronavirus were confirmed … [+4573 chars]
